column1: Question,Correct Answer,Wrong Answer 1,Wrong Answer 2,Wrong Answer 3
What is the correct syntax for a record?,"record Person(String name, int age) {}","class record Person(String name, int age)","record Person { String name
Which statement about records is true?,Records are implicitly final,Records can be extended,Records can have non-final fields,Records must have a no-arg constructor
Which is true about instance methods?,Require object instance to be called,Can be called on class name,Cannot access instance variables,Are shared across all instances
What is a compact constructor in records?,Constructor without parameter list,Constructor with all parameters,Static constructor,Private constructor
Which statement about static methods is correct?,Cannot access instance variables directly,Can access all instance variables,Require this keyword,Cannot be called on class name
Which is true about record components?,Automatically generate accessor methods,Must manually create getters,Cannot be accessed outside record,Are mutable by default
Which is true about static fields?,Shared among all instances,Unique to each instance,Cannot be modified,Must be private
What is the canonical constructor in a record?,Constructor with all components as parameters,Default no-arg constructor,Copy constructor,Static factory method
Which statement about instance initializers is true?,Execute before constructor body,Execute after constructor body,Execute only once per class,Are static by default
Which is true about records?,Cannot declare instance variables beyond components,Can add any instance variables,Must have at least one component,Cannot have constructors
Which is true about static initializer blocks?,Execute when class is loaded,Execute for each object creation,Execute after instance initializers,Cannot modify static variables
What is the result of record inheritance?,Records cannot extend other classes except Record,Records can extend any class,Records can be extended,Records must extend Object explicitly
Which statement about constructors is true?,Constructor name must match class name,Constructors can have return types,Constructors are inherited,Constructors must be public
Which is true about static methods in records?,Can be declared like regular classes,Cannot be declared in records,Must access record components,Are automatically generated
Which is true about instance variables?,Initialized to default values if not set,Must be initialized explicitly,Cannot be accessed in methods,Are shared across instances
Which statement about records is correct?,Records automatically implement equals() and hashCode(),Must manually implement equals(),Cannot override equals(),Records don't support equality
Which is true about record components?,Are implicitly private and final,Are public and mutable,Must be explicitly declared private,Cannot be primitive types
Which statement about static imports is correct?,Can import static members of a class,Can import instance members,Makes class static,Only works with methods
